text: Jeevitham Oru Raagam is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by UV Ravindranath, starring Devan and Shari. \- \- "Jeevitham Oru Raagam (1989) Movie Details" at Spicy Onion == Cast == * Devan as Mohan * Jagannadha Varma as Chithra's father/Muthalali * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Naanu * Mala Aravindan as Koran Kozhijanpara * Priya as Sharada * Ravi Menon as Ravi * Shari as Chithra * Thyagarajan as Raghavan *Balan K Nair as Gopalan *Mamukkoya as Sankaran *K. R. Savithri as Radha's mother *Valsala Menon as Savithri *Shanavas as Rajesh *Raji as Radha *Jayalakshmi as Sheelavathi == References == == External links == * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Jeevitham Oru Raagam
